metadata.name: Concrete Curves
metadata.description:
Life does not always turn out the way you expect it to. Sometimes you encounter the most unexpected twists and turns. But, if you stay focused and on track, you will undoubtedly arrive at your destination. Or maybe, just maybe, getting lost is what the journey is all about.

Photo taken from the rooftop of a high-rise in downtown Dubai. Empty roads in Dubai are a rare sight, unless you are up early in the morning on a Sunday.

Artist: Anand Deyanandan  
Twitter: [@bombaymalayali](https://twitter.com/bombaymalayali)
